# Learn React Basics

## Overview
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

## Tutorial Video
[youtube](dQw4w9WgXcQ)

## React Logo
![React Logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/a7/React-icon.svg)

## Key Concepts
- **Components**: Building blocks of React apps
- **JSX**: JavaScript XML syntax
- **Props**: Data passed to components
- **State**: Component data that changes

## Learn More
Visit the [Official React Docs](https://react.dev) for more information.

# Python Programming

## What is Python?
Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language.

![Python Logo](https://www.python.org/static/community_logos/python-logo-master-v3-TM.png)

## Video Tutorial
[youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqtD5dpn9C8)

## Core Features
- Easy to learn syntax
- Dynamic typing
- Extensive standard library
- Great for beginners

## Example Code
```python
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"
```

goals.title: Git Workflow Mastery
goals.documentation:
# Git Workflow

## Introduction
Git is a distributed version control system.

## Visual Guide
![Git Workflow](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1400/1*iL2J8k4ygQlg3xriKGimbQ.png)

## Git Tutorial
[youtube](z0vY6UgJ_Ws)

## Essential Commands
- `git init` - Initialize repository
- `git add` - Stage changes
- `git commit` - Save changes
- `git push` - Upload to remote
- `git pull` - Download from remote

## Best Practices
- Commit often with clear messages
- Use branches for features
- Pull before pushing

Learn more at [Git Documentation](https://git-scm.com/doc)
